name: CVE-2010-3228
description: The JIT compiler in Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 on 64-bit platforms does not properly perform optimizations, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted .NET application that triggers memory corruption, aka ".NET Framework x64 JIT Compiler Vulnerability."
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
